channel.title: Game Crash
channel.description: Ive found a crash in Blast Pit chapter, in the fan room leading to oxy/fuel. When I go down and start it, few seconds later the game crashes saying only hl2.exe stopped working, ive updated my graphic card, .NET etc. even reinstalled the Black Mesa and nothing works, i will be grateful for any help. DXdiag report [url]https://pastebay.net/1246842[/url] (in case its caused by hardware)

item.title: Game Crash
item.dc:creator: Bladesip
item.description:
https://wiki.blackmesasource.com/Troubleshooting_FAQ#When_I_turn_the_fan_on_in_Silo_D.2C_the_game_crashes_either_as_the_fan_spins_up_or_when_it_gets_to_max_speed.

Worked for me.

item.title: Game Crash
item.dc:creator: Gallyx
item.description:
Ive found a crash in Blast Pit chapter, in the fan room leading to oxy/fuel. When I go down and start it, few seconds later the game crashes saying only hl2.exe stopped working, ive updated my graphic card, .NET etc. even reinstalled the Black Mesa and nothing works, i will be grateful for any help. DXdiag report https://pastebay.net/1246842 (in case its caused by hardware)
